body: Do you also covert FP32 to FP16 in the graph body? The error message indicate FP16 (10) is expected but it got FP32 (1) (or vice versa)

Here is a readable view of the model:

```python
"""
Run this script to recreate the original onnx model.
Example usage:
python f16model_bad.py out_model_path.onnx
"""

from onnx import helper, numpy_helper, TensorProto

import onnx
import numpy as np
import sys

def order_repeated_field(repeated_proto, key_name, order):
    order = list(order)
    repeated_proto.sort(key=lambda x: order.index(getattr(x, key_name)))

def make_node(op_type, inputs, outputs, name=None, doc_string=None, domain=None, **kwargs):
    node = helper.make_node(op_type, inputs, outputs, name, doc_string, domain, **kwargs)
    if doc_string == '':
        node.doc_string = ''
    order_repeated_field(node.attribute, 'name', kwargs.keys())
    return node

def make_graph(*args, doc_string=None, **kwargs):
    graph = helper.make_graph(*args, doc_string=doc_string, **kwargs)
    if doc_string == '':
        graph.doc_string = ''
    return graph

model = helper.make_model(
    opset_imports=[helper.make_operatorsetid('', 9)],
    ir_version=4,
    producer_name='OnnxMLTools',
    producer_version='1.8.1',
    domain='onnxconverter-common',
    model_version=0,
    doc_string='onnx.fn: loop_test',
    graph=make_graph(
        name='loop_test',
        inputs=[helper.make_tensor_value_info('data', TensorProto.FLOAT16, shape=[None, None])],
        outputs=[helper.make_tensor_value_info('y1', TensorProto.FLOAT16, shape=[None]), helper.make_tensor_value_info('y2', TensorProto.FLOAT16, shape=[None, None])],
        value_info=[
            helper.make_tensor_value_info('loop_test_shape0', TensorProto.INT64, shape=[2]),
            helper.make_tensor_value_info('loop_test_constant20', TensorProto.INT64, shape=[]),
            helper.make_tensor_value_info('loop_test_gather0', TensorProto.INT64, shape=[]),
            helper.make_tensor_value_info('loop_test_constant201', TensorProto.INT64, shape=[1]),
            helper.make_tensor_value_info('loop_test_gather01', TensorProto.INT64, shape=[1]),
            helper.make_tensor_value_info('loop_test_constant_of_shape0', TensorProto.FLOAT16, shape=[None]),
            helper.make_tensor_value_info('loop_test_constant202', TensorProto.BOOL, shape=[]),
            helper.make_tensor_value_info('final_total', TensorProto.FLOAT16, shape=None),
            helper.make_tensor_value_info('scan_res', TensorProto.FLOAT16, shape=[None, None]),
        ],
        nodes=[
            make_node('Shape', inputs=['data'], outputs=['loop_test_shape0'], name='loop_test_shape', domain=''),
            make_node('Constant', inputs=[], outputs=['loop_test_constant20'], name='loop_test_constant2', domain='', value=numpy_helper.from_array(np.array(0, dtype=np.int64), name='c')),
            make_node('Gather', inputs=['loop_test_shape0', 'loop_test_constant20'], outputs=['loop_test_gather0'], name='loop_test_gather', domain='', axis=0),
            make_node('Constant', inputs=[], outputs=['loop_test_constant201'], name='loop_test_constant21', domain='', value=numpy_helper.from_array(np.array([1], dtype=np.int64), name='c1')),
            make_node('Gather', inputs=['loop_test_shape0', 'loop_test_constant201'], outputs=['loop_test_gather01'], name='loop_test_gather1', domain='', axis=0),
            make_node(
                'ConstantOfShape',
                inputs=['loop_test_gather01'],
                outputs=['loop_test_constant_of_shape0'],
                name='loop_test_constant_of_shape',
                domain='',
                value=numpy_helper.from_array(np.array([0.0], dtype=np.float16), name='cos'),
            ),
            make_node('Constant', inputs=[], outputs=['loop_test_constant202'], name='loop_test_constant22', domain='', value=numpy_helper.from_array(np.array(True, dtype=np.bool), name='c2')),
            make_node(
                'Loop',
                inputs=['loop_test_gather0', 'loop_test_constant202', 'loop_test_constant_of_shape0'],
                outputs=['final_total', 'scan_res'],
                name='loop_test_loop',
                domain='',
                body=make_graph(
                    name='range_body',
                    inputs=[
                        helper.make_tensor_value_info('iter_n', TensorProto.INT64, shape=[1]),
                        helper.make_tensor_value_info('cond', TensorProto.BOOL, shape=[]),
                        helper.make_tensor_value_info('total', TensorProto.FLOAT16, shape=[None]),
                    ],
                    outputs=[
                        helper.make_tensor_value_info('c_o', TensorProto.BOOL, shape=[]),
                        helper.make_tensor_value_info('total_o', TensorProto.FLOAT16, shape=[None]),
                        helper.make_tensor_value_info('scan_o', TensorProto.FLOAT16, shape=[None]),
                    ],
                    value_info=[
                        helper.make_tensor_value_info('range_body_squeeze0', TensorProto.INT64, shape=[]),
                        helper.make_tensor_value_info('range_body_gather0', TensorProto.FLOAT16, shape=[None]),
                        helper.make_tensor_value_info('range_body_add0', TensorProto.FLOAT16, shape=[None]),
                    ],
                    nodes=[
                        make_node('Squeeze', inputs=['iter_n'], outputs=['range_body_squeeze0'], name='range_body_squeeze', domain='', axes=[0]),
                        make_node('Gather', inputs=['data', 'range_body_squeeze0'], outputs=['range_body_gather0'], name='range_body_gather', domain='', axis=0),
                        make_node('Add', inputs=['total', 'range_body_gather0'], outputs=['range_body_add0'], name='range_body_add', domain=''),
                        make_node('Identity', inputs=['loop_test_constant202'], outputs=['c_o'], name='range_body_identity', domain=''),
                        make_node('Identity', inputs=['range_body_add0'], outputs=['total_o'], name='range_body_identity1', domain=''),
                        make_node('Identity', inputs=['range_body_add0'], outputs=['scan_o'], name='range_body_identity2', domain=''),
                    ],
                ),
            ),
            make_node('Identity', inputs=['final_total'], outputs=['y1'], name='loop_test_identity', domain=''),
            make_node('Identity', inputs=['scan_res'], outputs=['y2'], name='loop_test_identity1', domain=''),
        ],
    ),
)

if __name__ == '__main__' and len(sys.argv) == 2:
    _, out_path = sys.argv
    onnx.save(model, out_path)
```

This similar model reproduces the error on 1.7.0: 
https://microsoft-my.sharepoint-df.com/:u:/p/tomwi/EeP2VtvQPjhPqWSEfmhLzfMB0XLbfZENP8qH1B0t_oILmw?e=fyZToM
